translation:
I inform Your Excellency Alferes Ferreira of the 5th Corps of National Guards about the anarchists recently imprisoned in the Chapel: Cândido Machado de Sousa, Sebastião Gomes, Francisco Machado, João Rodrigues, Inácio Furtado, Manuel José dos Santos, Feliciano Francisco, lieutenant of the rebels, and Francisco José do Nascimento Júnior; the latter was released and handed over to Dr. Fagundes by a decree from Your Excellency.

Lieutenant Commander of the Prisons of Battalion 11.
